front.title: IEEE/ANSI Draft Standard for Portable Gamma and Radiation Detection Instrumentation for Homeland Security
front.abstract: This standard describes design criteria, performance requirements, and performance tests for portable exposure rate meters. The PDF of this standard is available in the IEEE GET program. "IEEE Get Program" grants public access to view and download individual PDFs of select standards at no charge. Visit https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page for details.
